column2: "Oh, what perfect timing. I was just thinking that I wanted to talk."
"A corrupted area appeared on Amduscia. You know about it, right?"
"The reason it became like that... it might be my fault."
"You've heard about it, right, <%me>?"
"That time when Aika almost became a Dark Falz."

"わたしが引き受けた【若人】の因子を
あの人が……ディーオ・ヒューナルが
持っていってくれた、って。"
"I think that event was the trigger that caused Amduscia to start becoming corrupted..."
"The reason corrupted areas began to appear on Naberius and Lillipa was because of Dark Falz and the Profound Darkness..."
"Oh, I'm sorry... I'm okay, I'm all right."
"I was able to help Aika, and I don't regret it at all. Really."
"While I do think back on all the trouble I've caused people... I don't regret it."
"No matter what happened as a result of that event, I believe I did the best I possibly could."
"But... Xiao and Xiera seem to see things slightly different."
"If it was caused by the event involving me and Aika, it's strange that it didn't appear around that time."
"Even if it was one of the causes, they said there had to be more to it."
"But when we look at recent events, there's not much happening lately."
"1. The ARKS Mothership was invaded the other day."
"2. I met with Matoi again."
"...Right. The people of Earth... and Mother's invasion. The fusion of Photons and Ether..."

"たぶん、それも原因の一つって
疑ってるんだと思う。
タイミング的にも、ばっちりだし。"

"え、えええっ！？
わたしたちの再会が原因！？"

"た、たしかに
<%me>とは
すれ違ってばっかだったけど……！"
"いやいやそうじゃなくって！"

"……たぶん、シャオくんたちは
マザーの襲撃も原因の一つって
考えてるんだよ。"

"フォトンとエーテルの融合も
もしかしたら、【深遠なる闇】に
影響があるのかもしれない。"

"……だから
わたしたちも、頑張らないとね。
<%me>。"
